item.title: Text Snippets
item.description: About This is a work in progress. I'm copying over my commonly used text snippets and wireframes as I go. item.title: Blind Text Generator
item.description: I prefer not to use dummy text, because creating wireframes and comps that reflect how they will really look and function is what people pay me for, and is a sign of a lazy IA/IXD. Plus it can be really enjoyable to write real fake copy. Having said that, I have to admit to being the lazy IA from time to timeand have gone to gone to lipsum.com to generate dummy text.
